events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated for several days, and I am very concerned about the delay.
The system has categorized this issue as a Delivery Delay based on the customer's message mentioning late delivery and tracking problems.
An available customer service agent has been assigned to handle the delivery delay case for this customer to provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order has not arrived yet, and Iâ€™m here to help resolve the delay issue for you.
Could you please provide me with your order number or any tracking details you have, so I can look into the shipment status more thoroughly?
Sure, my order number is 9876543210, and the last update on the tracking page was from five days ago showing it was still at the shipping facility.
Thank you for the details. I have contacted the courier and arranged for expedited handling of your package. You should receive an updated tracking notification soon.
I appreciate your quick help with this. I will keep an eye on the tracking updates and hope to receive the package soon.
The courier confirmed that your package has been prioritized and should be delivered within the next two days. Please let us know if you experience any further issues.
We are following up to ensure that your package has arrived and that you are satisfied with the solution regarding the delivery delay.
As we have not received further complaints and you confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
